Package pl.put.poznan.buildinfo.rest

Class BuildingInfoController

java.lang.Object
pl.put.poznan.buildinfo.rest.BuildingInfoController
@RestController public class BuildingInfoController extends Object
Implementation of the BuildingInfoController class responsible for controlling the REST API interface

    • findById

      public static Location findById(List<Location> list, int id)
      Method to find locations with a specific id.
      Parameters:
      list - list of available locations
      id - id of a given location
      Returns:
      location or null when there is no location with a specific id

    • root

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, produces="application/json", value="/") public String root()
      Method implementing the root endpoint, presenting information on available endpoints.
      Returns:
      rootMessage message containing information on available endpoints

    • getListOfLocations

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, produces="application/json", value="/ListOfLocations") public static List<Location> getListOfLocations() throws IOException
      Method implementing 'ListOfLocations' endpoint, providing information on all locations in JSON format.
      Returns:
      listOfLocations list of locations in JSON format
      Throws:
      IOException - when it cannot get list of locations

    • getLocation

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, produces="application/json", value="/show") public static String getLocation(@RequestParam("id") String idString) throws IOException
      Method implementing 'show' endpoint. Displays the data of a location with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      idString - location id
      Returns:
      locationInfo information on the location with the given id
      Throws:
      IOException - when it cannot find a particular location, or an id is given in an incorrect format

    • getArea

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, produces="application/json", value="/get_area") public static String getArea(@RequestParam("id") String idString) throws IOException
      Method implementing 'get_area' endpoint. Displays the area of the location with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      idString - location id
      Returns:
      locationArea area of the location
      Throws:
      IOException - when it cannot find a particular location, or an id is given in an incorrect format

    • getVolume

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, produces="application/json", value="/get_volume") public static String getVolume(@RequestParam("id") String idString) throws IOException
      Method implementing 'get_volume' endpoint. Displays the volume of the location with the specified id.
      Parameters:
      idString - location id
      Returns:
      locationVolume volume of the location
      Throws:
      IOException - when it cannot find a particular location, or an id is given in an incorrect format

    • getLightPower

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, produces="application/json", value="/get_light_power") public static String getLightPower(@RequestParam("id") String idString) throws IOException

      Parameters:
      idString - location id
      Returns:
      locationLightPower light power of the location
      Throws:
      IOException - when it cannot find a particular location, or an id is given in an incorrect format

    • getHeatingUsage

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, produces="application/json", value="/get_heating_usage") public static String getHeatingUsage(@RequestParam("id") String idString) throws IOException
      Method implementing 'get_heating_usage' endpoint. Displays the energy consumption for heating of the location with the given id.
      Parameters:
      idString - location id
      Returns:
      energyConsumptionHeating energy consumption for heating of the location
      Throws:
      IOException - when it cannot find a particular location, or an id is given in an incorrect format

    • HeatingOverdose

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, produces="application/json", value="/heating_over_limit") public static List<Room> HeatingOverdose(@RequestParam("limit") double limit, @RequestParam("id") int id) throws IOException
      Method implementing 'heating_over_limit' endpoint. Display rooms which exceed the specified energy consumption limit for heating in a building with the given id.
      Parameters:
      limit - energy consumption limit
      id - building id
      Returns:
      roomsOverdose rooms with heating usage over given limit
      Throws:
      IOException - when it cannot find a particular location, or an id is given in an incorrect format
